# **Welcome**

Hello! My name is Chloé Ostermann and I am a third year student at UC Santa Barbara pursuing a BS degree in Environmental Studies with a minor in Architecture and Urban History.

# Education

University of California, Santa Barbara - Environmental Studies B.S, Architecture and Urban History minor (Expected June 2026)

# Current Positions

I am currently working as an undergraduate research assistant for the Sakamoto group in UCSB's Materials Department where I am studying the electrochemical properties of various ion-exchange membranes. I also work at UCSB's dining common Carrillo where I serve food, and buss tables.
